TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataSourceProvider

summary.span: Defines an interface that a control designer can implement to provide access to a data source.

span.span: Defines an interface that a control designer can implement to provide access to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 能夠提供資料來源的類別可以實作這個介面以存取其資料來源所使用的物件介面。A class that is able to provide a data source can implement this interface to enable access to its data source by objects that use the interface. 這個介面由和類別。This interface is used by the and classes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範名為自訂類別`TemplatedListDesigner`，後者繼承自類別，並且實作`IDataSourceProvider`介面。The following code example shows a custom class, named `TemplatedListDesigner`, which inherits from the class and implements the `IDataSourceProvider` interface. [!code-xml[System.Web.UI.Design_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.design_samples1/Common/System.Web.UI.Design_Samples1.xml#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetResolvedSelectedDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: Gets the selected data member from the selected data source.

span.span: Gets the selected data member from the selected data source.

returns.span: The selected data member from the selected data source, if the control allows the user to select an (such as a ) for the data source, and provides a property to select a particular list (or ) within the data source.

span.span: The selected data member from the selected data source, if the control allows the user to select an (such as a ) for the data source, and provides a property to select a particular list (or ) within the data source.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作`GetResolvedSelectedDataSource`和方法介面。The following code example implements the `GetResolvedSelectedDataSource` and methods of the interface. `GetSelectedDataSource`方法取得任意物件做為資料來源，以及這項實作`GetResolvedSelectedDataSource`方法會將轉換成該物件物件。The `GetSelectedDataSource` method gets an arbitrary object as the data source, and this implementation of the `GetResolvedSelectedDataSource` method converts that object into an object. [!code-xml[System.Web.UI.Design_Samples1#17](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.design_samples1/Common/System.Web.UI.Design_Samples1.xml#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetSelectedDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: Gets a reference to the selected data source from the data source provider.

span.span: Gets a reference to the selected data source from the data source provider.

returns.span: The currently selected data source object of this data source provider.

span.span: The currently selected data source object of this data source provider.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作同時`GetSelectedDataSource`和方法介面。The following code example implements both the `GetSelectedDataSource` and methods of the interface. `GetSelectedDataSource`方法用來確保在設計階段與控制項相關聯的資料來源物件，用於實作介面。The `GetSelectedDataSource` method is used to ensure that the data source associated with the control at design time is an object that implements the interface. 這可讓使用者逐一查看資料來源。This allows users to iterate through the data source. [!code-xml[System.Web.UI.Design_Samples1#17](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.design_samples1/Common/System.Web.UI.Design_Samples1.xml#17)]
